flawed_nl_solution:
After this week, Michelangelo will have 28-12=<<28-12=12>>12 more ceilings to paint.
Next week, Michelangelo will paint 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 ceilings.
Michelangelo will have 12-3=<<12-3=9>>9 more ceilings to paint.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
